root.texto: THREAD: As you might know, I'm a #FormerGOP . I voted Republican loyally for over 30 years. But when Trump won the Primary, I was able to see the true and dispicably UGLY face of my party, and I have never gone back again. https://t.co/F5p5dn3siQ Many wonderful people in #TheResistance have taken me in, educated me, and helped me to become a much better person. They have helped me to realize that so many of my hard-core, basic beliefs were incompatible with voting Republican. I owe you all so many thanks for that! https://t.co/Sc1uHEYYvQ Today, I learned something else... When I first saw the #Rose üåπ symbol in various profiles, I googled it and also asked some people who were using it, what it meant. I was told it was just a symbol of #Resistance, & I thought it was no different than the #Omega / #Ohm symbol. Well, my daughters middle name is Rose, and I just like roses anyway, so I chose to put that in my profile. https://t.co/HiwrNPZ3pj One wonderful person today explained some of my recent confusion. Apparently, Bernie supporters have taken to using üåπ as their symbol, & I was unknowingly aligning myself w/ a #Resistance faction. My tweets for unity, therefore, seemed disingenuous to some Hillary supporters. I have nothing against Bernie or ANY of his supporters, but I do not wish to sow division or disunion, so I will be removing that symbol. I do not wish to align myself with ANY factions, & I truly think it is VITAL that everyone in #TheResistance stands united against the GOP. https://t.co/z0vm5HLVMy At this point in my thread, it's important for you to know that I watched the Democratic Primaries in 2016 as someone who was very recently "politically homeless." I had no horse in the race, and I was simply looking at options. https://t.co/DNEQsURm9F I was worried to later hear of the scandal surrounding @SenSanders treatment by the DNC. Knowing how Trump worked, I was afraid he would use that repeatedly against Hillary. I needn't have worried, it seems, because Trump let his pal Putin do that for him on social media. Putin, we now know, stoked the pre-existing flames of discontent among many who were--and still are-- @SenSander's followers. Putin used social media like a crowbar, to turn the crack that originally existed between the "Bernie" & "Hillary" camps, into a chasm. We CANNOT let that happen again! https://t.co/BdE7CPR4U4 Recently, #TheResistance has discovered a large number of bot accounts in their midst, placed there by possible Russian operatives (based on the @ names). No matter who has created them, their purpose is clearly malicious. https://t.co/rxUbJvsYIB Now, with #Mueller's indictments, we see the evidence that Putin was trying to divide the Left from day one, as far back as 2014. I truly believe that THIS is the main purpose of these new bot accounts. https://t.co/uMsUkFeBch With the upcoming 2018 elections, and as new Presidential candidates arise, Putin wishes to influence-- nay, MANIPULATE-- us once again, and once more try to have his own PUPPET American government. We CANNOT let that happen! https://t.co/wAnjQ6eWTm Unblock each other, re-friend each other, LIKE each other's posts & tweets, and be especially careful to check profiles. Ignore ANY words of more division & bitterness, and work instead towards unity & peace in #TheResistance. https://t.co/i1FfK9XnkM Too many districts are Red, and we NEED to #FlipBlue. Too many of those CAN be flipped, but we will have to work hard. We will have to get EVERY possible Blue vote to the polls-- no matter if they were once voters for "Bernie" or "Hillary" or "none of the above." #BlueWave https://t.co/S3F6PUFvqg Ours is a great & powerful Democracy, one that has been tarnished & humiliated by the stain of the corrupt & blood-soaked #GOP, and by Putin's manipulations. https://t.co/fgDdguXUH9 But we CAN, and we WILL, shine once more. We CAN, and we WILL, be a proud nation once more. We CAN, and we WILL, embrace hope once more. PEACE, my fellow #Resistance! https://t.co/Aze4On61Lt Let us find our redemption in our resolve, and find our pride in the power of our unity. Let us be a beacon in this wonderful nation, and bring HOPE to it once more. Let us NEVER surrender to the forces of darkness and division. https://t.co/Yyga1YhVyW We are #TheResistance . And we MUST co-exist in PEACE. üïäÔ∏è‚úåÔ∏èüïäÔ∏è‚òÆÔ∏èüïäÔ∏è‚úåÔ∏èüïäÔ∏è https://t.co/s63lUfd1l1
